00020 #include <com/xuggle/xuggler/ContainerFormat.h>

00022 #define VS_FFMPEG_GOT_OFF_THEIR_BUTT_AND_EXPOSED_THIS
00023 #ifdef VS_FFMPEG_GOT_OFF_THEIR_BUTT_AND_EXPOSED_THIS
00024 /*
00025  * Sigh; this hack is necessary because FFMPEG doesn't actually
00026  * expose the AVCodecTag structure.  This might break if they
00027  * change the structure, but by placing it here it should
00028  * at least cause a compiler error.
00029  */
00030 struct AVCodecTag
00031 {
00032   int32_t id;
00033   uint32_t tag;
00034 };
00035 #endif

00040   ContainerFormat :: ContainerFormat()
00041   {
00042     mInputFormat = NULL;
00043     mOutputFormat = NULL;
00044   }
00045 
00046   ContainerFormat :: ~ContainerFormat()
00047   {
00048   }

00050   int32_t
00051   ContainerFormat :: setInputFormat(const char *shortName)
00052   {
00053     if (shortName && *shortName)
00054     {
00055       mInputFormat = av_find_input_format(shortName);
00056     } else {
00057       mInputFormat = NULL;
00058     }
00059     return (mInputFormat == NULL ? -1 : 0);
00060   }
00061   int32_t
00062   ContainerFormat :: setOutputFormat(const char*shortName,
00063       const char*url,
00064       const char* mimeType)
00065   {
00066     if ((shortName && *shortName) ||
00067         (url && *url) ||
00068         (mimeType && *mimeType))
00069     {
00070       mOutputFormat = av_guess_format(shortName, url, mimeType);
00071     } else {
00072       mOutputFormat = NULL;
00073     }
00074     return (mOutputFormat == NULL ? -1 : 0);
00075   }

00135   bool
00136   ContainerFormat :: getInputFlag(IContainerFormat::Flags flag)
00137   {
00138     bool result = false;
00139     if (mInputFormat)
00140       result = mInputFormat->flags & flag;
00141     return result;
00142   }

00144   void
00145   ContainerFormat :: setInputFlag(IContainerFormat::Flags flag, bool value)
00146   {
00147     if (mInputFormat)
00148     {
00149       if (value)
00150       {
00151         mInputFormat->flags |= flag;
00152       }
00153       else
00154       {
00155         mInputFormat->flags &= (~flag);
00156       }
00157     }
00158   }

00210   ContainerFormat :: getOutputExtensions()
00211   {

00213         !*mOutputFormat->extensions)
00214       return 0;

00219   ContainerFormat :: getOutputDefaultAudioCodec()

00242   int32_t
00243   ContainerFormat :: getOutputNumCodecsSupported()
00244   {
00245     if (!mOutputFormat)
00246       return 0;
00247     
00248     const struct AVCodecTag * const*tags = mOutputFormat->codec_tag;
00249     if (!tags)
00250       return 0;
00251 
00252     int numCodecs = 0;
00253 
00254     for(int i = 0;
00255         tags[i];
00256         i++)
00257     {
00258       for(const struct AVCodecTag * tag = tags[i];
00259           tag && tag->id != ICodec::CODEC_ID_NONE;
00260           ++tag)
00261       {
00262         ++numCodecs;
00263       }
00264     }
00265     return numCodecs;
00266   }
00267   ICodec::ID
00268   ContainerFormat :: getOutputCodecID(int32_t index)
00269   {
00270     if (index < 0)
00271       return ICodec::CODEC_ID_NONE;
00272 
00273     const struct AVCodecTag * const*tags = mOutputFormat->codec_tag;
00274     if (!tags)
00275       return ICodec::CODEC_ID_NONE;
00276 
00277     int numCodecs = 0;
00278 
00279     for(int i = 0;
00280         tags[i];
00281         i++)
00282     {
00283       for(
00284           const struct AVCodecTag * tag = tags[i];
00285           tag && tag->id != ICodec::CODEC_ID_NONE;
00286           ++tag, ++numCodecs)
00287       {
00288         if (numCodecs == index)
00289           return (ICodec::ID)tag->id;
00290       }
00291     }
00292     return ICodec::CODEC_ID_NONE;
00293   }
00294 
00295   int32_t
00296   ContainerFormat :: getOutputCodecTag(int32_t index)
00297   {
00298     if (index < 0)
00299       return ICodec::CODEC_ID_NONE;
00300 
00301     const struct AVCodecTag * const*tags = mOutputFormat->codec_tag;
00302     if (!tags)
00303       return ICodec::CODEC_ID_NONE;
00304 
00305     int numCodecs = 0;
00306 
00307     for(int i = 0;
00308         tags[i];
00309         i++)
00310     {
00311       for(
00312           const struct AVCodecTag * tag = tags[i];
00313           tag && tag->id != ICodec::CODEC_ID_NONE;
00314           ++tag, ++numCodecs)
00315       {
00316         if (numCodecs == index)
00317           return tag->tag;
00318       }
00319     }
00320     return ICodec::CODEC_ID_NONE;
00321   }
00322 
00323   bool
00324   ContainerFormat :: isCodecSupportedForOutput(ICodec::ID id)
00325   {
00326     return getOutputCodecTag(id);
00327   }
00328   
00329   int32_t
00330   ContainerFormat :: getOutputCodecTag(ICodec::ID id)
00331   {
00332     if (!mOutputFormat)
00333       return 0;
00334     return (int32_t)av_codec_get_tag(mOutputFormat->codec_tag,
00335         (enum CodecID)id);
00336     
00337   }
